items.text:
Eyes closed, Nal is focused fully on the Verdessian. You can feel the
connection between them. It’s as if the very air is energized and alive.
You close your eyes and see a vision of endless green—the canopy
of the Verdessa stretching far to the south—and you feel a sudden
kinship with the Verdessian, two lifeforms together in the substrata of
all existence.

You may shuffle one card from the challenge discard back into the
challenge deck. Discard all
from Spirit Speaker Nal. (She is not discarded.)
